title: Classic Camel Coat
content:
If there's one thing I don't mind splurging on for fall, it's a really nice coat. When it's cold out, they're all some people will see of your outfit and can be staples in your closet for years. I've been searching for a classic camel-colored wool coat for such a long time, I was starting to think I'd never find one. But then, on a random shopping trip with my friend Roy, we strolled past this coat hanging out in the Aritzia store window. It's made of a crazy thick wool/cashmere blend which makes me feel like I'm under one seriously toasty blanket when I wear it. (Cozy central). I also love the slightly masculine cut balanced by a tailored fit and stand-up cocoon collar.

Which fall coats do you have your eye on this season?

(Cocoon Coat by Wilfred)
